name: §cDeal §cwith §cthe §cDevil
description: Villagers will always have higher prices for a demon.

entity_action.command: execute as @p[tag=zombie] at @s run data modify entity @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,limit=1,sort=random,distance=..64] AngryAt set from entity @s UUID

actions.command: execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data modify entity @s Gossips append value {Type: 'major_negative', Value: 110, Target:[I;1,1,1,1]}
execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data modify entity @s Gossips[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1]}].Target set from entity @p UUID
